news_content.myway: 22/07/2022 - Second single "My Way" release||Argo der my way. You can listen to My Way on our music section, or find it in Spotify. Check it out!||myway.jpeg
news_content.freedom: 10/06/2022 - First single "Freedom" release||After a long delay, we have finally published the first single from our upcoming album. You can listen to Freedom on our music section, or find it in Spotify. Check it out!||freedom.png
news_content.new_record: 20/09/2021 - New record almost finished||We are working in the last touches to finish our first record, which will see the light of day during next year. Stay tuned!||
news_content.gig1: 21/02/2020 - Gig at the Hollander (Seville)||We will be playing our first gig along Surya at the Hollander in Seville.||hollander.jpeg

Sin embargo, la irrupci칩n de la pandemia sanitaria retrasa sus planes de difusi칩n y no hay noticias del tr칤o hasta junio de 2022, cuando sale un primer sencillo y videoclip, Freedom, al que da continuidad un mes m치s tarde My Way.
